channel.title: 1 compile error with baning
channel.description:
client.java:10436: illegal start of expression PlayerHander.messageToAll = player + " has been smoked by Mod " +playerName+;
^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
I had two, but fixed one and dont know how to with this one. im using testscape btw.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 03, 2006, 07:43:06 PM[/size][hr]If i remove the sendmessage i get this
client.java:624: appendToBanned(java.lang.String) is already defined in client public void appendToBanned (String player) ^ client.java:7917: appendToBanned(java.lang.String) is already defined in client public void appendToBanned (String player) { ^ client.java:10440: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client PlayerHandler.kickNick = player; ^ client.java:10445: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client appendToBanned(player); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .
